thread.title: LG Nexus 5X India launch could happen on October 19: Price, specifications and features
thread.title_full: LG Nexus 5X India launch could happen on October 19: Price, specifications and features - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: LG Nexus 5X India launch could happen on October 19: Price, specifications and features
text: Google today unveiled the two new LG Nexus 5X and the Huawei Nexus 6P at its event in San Francisco. In India, the LG Nexus 5X is priced at Rs 31,900 for the 16GB variant, while the prices for the Huawei Nexus 6P start from Rs 39,999 onwards for 32GB. Google today mentioned that its new Nexus smartphones will be up for pre-orders starting tonight, and will go on sale in the US, UK, Ireland and Japan sometime next month. Among the two, LG Nexus 5X could launch in India as early as October 19. LG, in a press release, stated that its Nexus smartphone will go on sale in 40 additional countries in the fourth quarter, starting from October 19. While Â»
